items.sentence: There are things that I hate more than this.
This is the best that we've played all year.
The ice cream I ate yesterday was delicious.
That's not the kid that came here yesterday.
We've gotten ourselves into a bad situation.
I don't want to risk losing Tom as a friend.
We found ourselves in a dangerous situation.
It sounded as if Tom didn't know what to do.
I know Tom well. We went to the same school.
There's something in the middle of the road.
There was a large boulder blocking the road.
Tom will get out of prison before Mary does.
By the time I arrived, Tom was already gone.
Tom will soon find out how different we are.
There's a chance that we'll have to do that.
Tom gave me a playful punch in the shoulder.
Tom can recite 314 digits of pi from memory.
The sale of cigarettes should be prohibited.
There's absolutely nothing that can be done.
The access road is blocked by a fallen tree.
